title: REMODELED two-bedroom AND CARPORT just $1,629/month!! 8/6/22
posting_body: ['Our larger (1,100 sq ft, remodeled finish - stainless appliances/dark cabinets, with a walk-out balcony) TWO-BEDROOM, TWO-BATHROOM prices today are starting at $1,629/month!!!', 'Available for', 'AUGUST 6, 2022', 'move-in, upon application approval!!', 'Welcome to The Crossing at Eagle Pond Apartment Homes.', "We're an apartment community conveniently located near major expressways, local shopping, dining, and entertainment.", 'Our beautiful community offers top notch amenities and beautifully designed apartment homes.', 'We are proud to offer spacious studio, one, and two bedroom apartment homes in an amazing atmosphere and convenient location.', 'Here, our residents always come first with remarkable service provided by the Leasing Staff and Maintenance Technicians.', "Here's just a list of some of the amenities you'll enjoy as a resident at the Crossing at Eagle Pond Apartment Homes:", 'Central Air Conditioning', 'Dishwasher', 'Garbage Disposal', 'Microwave', 'Range', 'Refrigerator', 'Oven', '3 sets of washers and dryers on every floor for your convenience.', 'Storage units available on every floor for a small monthly fee', 'Private, fenced-in Bark Park', 'One private carport included free of charge', '24/7 upgraded fitness center', 'Resident lounge with complimentary WiFi', 'On-site maintenance with 24-hour emergency service', 'Professional and friendly Leasing and Maintenance staff', 'Call Marge at', 'show contact info', 'and ask about TODAY’S rates and specials!!!', 'The Crossing at Eagle Pond Apartment Homes is an equal opportunity lender.', 'This ad may still be online even if said Apartment is leased or reserved.', 'Prices are subject to change without prior notice.', 'Always call the leasing office for current pricing and availability.', 'Pricing and availability are subject to change without notice.', 'We look forward to hearing from you SOON!!', 'Copy/paste link below to check availability and apply:', '<URL>']
